modName: prOPAs ENB 117 and 119 darker Nights for CoT
summary: This is a ENB Preset with CoT Compatibility
descriptionHtml:
[center][img=]http://s19.postimage.org/9twgrc0yb/ENB_Header.jpg[/img][/center]


[color=yellow][size=6][u][center][font=\"Impact\"]If you like my work, PLEASE ENDORSE![/font][/center][/u][/size][/color]

[center]U need  the ENB D3D9.DLL 119 Beta from Borris[/center]
[center]http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm[/center]
[center][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENB D3D9.DLL 119 Beta Link[/url][/center]

[center]This ENB mod also needs the Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting by JJC71[/center]
[center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]CoT Link[/url][/center]

[color=yellow][size=6][u][center][font=\"Impact\"]Update to 1.0b with extra brighter Nights Preset File[/font][/center][/u][/size][/color]

[center]Thx hodilton for this nice Video[/center]
[center][youtube]93t72cP5xS4[/youtube][/center]



[center][img=]http://s19.postimage.org/fcz08jxzn/TESV_2012_08_26_19_12_25_51.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://s19.postimage.org/a2u1h9dqr/TESV_2012_08_26_21_25_55_33.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://s19.postimage.org/728lmzd1v/TESV_2012_08_26_17_12_18_78.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://s19.postimage.org/u53pzw3wz/TESV_2012_08_26_18_29_41_04.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://s19.postimage.org/ys9s1nr9v/TESV_2012_08_26_21_38_32_04.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://s19.postimage.org/6tfmaspn7/TESV_2012_08_27_04_39_48_56.jpg[/img][/center]


Credits 

Boris Vorontsov (ENB Series)
HeliosDoubleSix (Custom ENB Shaders)
Matso (Custom Depth of Field)
Mindflux (Further Dark Dungeons for ENB)
TheCompiler (STEP - Skyrim Total Enhancement Project)
JJC71 (Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting)
hodilton (YT Video from my ENB)
